trans-unit.source: Contains information about the exception that is raised when an attempt is made to access an UI Automation element corresponding to a part of the user interface that is no longer available.
trans-unit.target: 包含在嘗試存取使用者介面自動化項目時所引發之例外狀況的相關資訊，此項目對應至已無法使用的使用者介面部分。

trans-unit.source: This exception can be raised if the element was in a dialog box that was closed, or an application that was closed or terminated.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目已關閉的對話方塊中或已關閉或結束應用程式中，可能會引發這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成此例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> class with a reference to the inner exception that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用導致這個例外狀況的內部例外參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Data needed to serialize or deserialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或還原序列化物件所需的資料。

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 序列化資料流的來源和目的端。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> class with serialization information.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成此例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息和導致此例外狀況之內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Data needed to serialize or deserialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或還原序列化物件所需的資料。

trans-unit.source: The destination of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 已序列化資料流的目的端。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取序列化目標物件所需的資料。
